channel.title: Projects on SIYABONGA
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on SIYABONGA

item.title: Employee Attrition EDA
item.description: This project explores the Employee Attrition of an organization. It uses Matplotlib & Seaborn for visualization of the different variables that may or may not be contributing to employees leaving the organization link : https://github.com/Bhununuza10/My-Data-Analytics-Journey/blob/main/Employee%20Churn%20project%202%20Complete.ipynb

item.title: The Machine Learning Project
item.description: A machine learning project with data related direct to marketing campaigns (phone calls) of a Portuguese banking institution. The classification goal is to predict if the client will subscribe a term deposit (variable y) and compares three classification models( GradientBoostingClassifier, DecisionTreeClassifier & XGBClassifier )

item.title: Eswatini Covid-19 2022
item.description: This project looks into The Kingdom of Eswatini Covid-19 numbers in comparison with the past two years link: https://github.com/Bhununuza10/My-Data-Analytics-Journey/blob/main/Covid-19%202022%20Eswatini.ipynb

item.title: 2021 World Happiness
item.description: The Worlds Happiness Report ranks countries’ happiness based on respondents ratings of their own lives, which the report correlates with various(quality of) life factors(Gross National Happiness a.k.a GNN). This project focuses much more on showcasing my Data Visualization skills( Matplotlib and Seaborn) with some commentary based on the data link: https://github.com/Bhununuza10/My-Data-Analytics-Journey/blob/main/2021%20World%20Happiness(Exploratory%20Data%20Analysis)%20complete.ipynb
